Harvard University offers variety of professional courses for all academic aspect globally. You could choose to study any of the following courses in Harvard;

Where Harvard University

You may be asking where Harvard University is located and lots more. Here is brief information about Harvard University. Harvard University is Located outside Boston in Cambridge, Massachusetts, an urban setting across the Charles River from Boston. Harvard University is made up of 13 schools and an institute, including the top-ranked Kennedy School of Government and this makes Harvard the strongest among its course offerings. Harvard is a private, nonprofit institution that was founded in 1636 colonial America by the General Court of the Massachusetts Bay Colony.

List of Free Harvard Online Courses | CS50 Pack.

You may be asking, Does Harvard University offer free online courses?

The answer is yes.

Among other suitable and affordable courses found in Harvard Online Courses, the following courses can be studied in Harvard for free. Study free online courses in a variety of subjects. Harvard University courses found below can be audited free or students can choose to receive a verified certificate for a small fee.

  • CS50’s Introduction to Computer Science
  • CS50’s Introduction to Programming with Python.
  • CS50’s Web Programming with Python and JavaScript
  • CS50’s Introduction to Artificial Intelligence with Python
  • CS50’s Introduction to Game Development
  • Exercising Leadership: Foundational Principles
  • Data Science: R Basics
  • Rhetoric: The Art of Persuasive Writing and Public Speaking
  • Fundamentals of Neuroscience, The Electrical
  • Data Science: Machine Learning
  • Entrepreneurship in Emerging Economies
  • Contract Law: From Trust to Promise to Contract
  • Justice
  • Remote Work Revolution for Everyone

Harvard Courses Pack

A course Pack is a digital and/or printed copy of books, journals, articles, and chapters of book given or sold to student which are not already available electronically via Harvard’s Library System. Most Harvard Courses are prepaid in Packs and offer to student. It contains full course contents that make a certificate at the end of the course completion.

How can I Get Harvard Course Pack?

A course pack is a custom published anthology of journal articles, chapters from books or an entire out-of-print book, and/or original materials which have never been published (any and all of which are not available electronically via Harvard’s library system). If you would like to produce a course pack, we suggest that you work with Cognella (formerly University Readers), a third-party vendor who will obtain copyright permissions, format materials, and sell copies of your course pack to your students in digital and/or print form through their website.

What is Harvard CS50 Pack?

This platform offer a series of introductory CS50 courses and Professional Certificate programs from Harvard that is open to learners of all backgrounds. CS50 gives you enormous knowledge on how Harvard CS works.
